Reviews.Title: VERY NICE
Reviews.Author: Ant
Reviews.Content: This phone is great..easy to us, doesn't freeze, very kool being it a touch screen blackberry style phone. I wish the screen was a lot bigger...but I'm use to 5.0 inchech screen Androids. Dual Sim rocks..if your a person that needs a phone with buttons then this is the phone for you. If you don't want to pay 600 bucks plus for a stylish Blackberry, you should get this phone...NIU is a good phone company.

Reviews.Title: its not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Samuel Castillo
Reviews.Content: i thought it was a different  kind ofphone and a better version of the phone. i cant get none of the ringgtones
